title: Dating the Messenger: The Untold Story of a Clairvoyant
description: As world catastrophes have reminded us of how uncertain and precious life can be, an inspiring tale has emerged to encourage our friends, children and ourselves to live a life of meaning. Faced with loneliness, self-doubt, problems, ridicule and even death, an unlikely heroine was guided to develop her spiritual strength to be the leader she was born to be. K's intimate and heartwarming story provides a practical guide for dating and hope for those in search of true love. Without knowing why, a person's internal guidance has always been directing his or her future for the better. Yet, ignoring intuition results in bad outcomes. With their enchanting story, K and Dr. Michael's Dating the Messenger: The Untold Story of a Clairvoyant will amaze you with the universal truths and wisdom of Spirit, who lovingly and gently guides all to a better life. This intimate journey to find love helps readers know and accept their own uniqueness, just as K discovered on her way to find the man that Spirit promised. With K's intriguing tale of online dating, you may find yourself laughing and crying as you meet the 'animals' in her life.
author: K. Taylor
